title: Wow, toplane is surprisingly diverse atm
body:
https://www.leagueofgraphs.com/champions/stats/euw/top/diamond/by-winrate
Some guy linked Diamond win rates trying to prove tanks were Overpowered, so I starting memeing it up to throw back at him, but... While I was doing that, I realized Top lane is surprisingly diverse...
https://i.imgur.com/fNCOegd.png
Good job, I think?

replies.body:
Shen *is* a tank, though.

Also, that is fair for Cho'gath. He's the dps/tank/assassin/juggernaut, I guess.

> [{quoted}](name=DuskDaUmbreon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AB3UWBGd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-09-09T21:03:50.283+0000)
>
> Shen *is* a tank, though.
> 
> Also, that is fair for Cho'gath. He's the dps/tank/assassin/juggernaut, I guess.

dps/tank/assassin/juggernaut/support/mage

Literally give him everything

Shen just feels miserable to play unless he's like the only champion you play. Just venting about LCS balance. Even as a top lane tank, Shen is better identified by his ult then his tankiness. It's also slightly a joke, probably shouldn't have counted Malphite as "Numero dos" but that was kinda set-up for Morde -3-

Cho'Gath's trying to do too much, and unlike other champions stuck like that he's actually empowered to do too much.

volibear #1

#1 in needing of massive buffs that is
Top lane is diverse, a mess, the lane your noob jungler goes to camp if he doesn't know how to properly roam, the lane where everything fucking bad happens... I HATE TOP LANE THESE DAYS UGHHHHH
Even mordekaiser, ryze, and heimer made the list but even Fiora couldn't lol.
